room_title: Escape room "The Raven and the Red Death" by Epic Team Adventures in Seattle
room_description:
Inspired by stories of Edgar Alan Poe, players start this enigmatic adventure marooned in the center of the mansion in The Masque of the Red Death, and they have 60 minutes to explore and navigate different rooms of the mansion to map out their escape route.
This intense experience culminates in a frantic race against time to exit the mansion before Red Death escapes. The team must plan their escape to be fast and precise, as encountering the Red Death enroute will result in immediate defeat and death.
